name: Tri Attack
summary: Deals damage, and has a 20% chance to either paralyze, freeze, or burn the target. Each ailment has a 6.67% chance of being inflicted.
viability: Tri Attack is excellent on the Porygon line and Aurorus line. The former has a great STAB move to use, while the latter can make use of Nature Power and Tri Attack as a result. Mega Camerupt can also use Nature Power (Tri AttacK) and it gets the Sheer Force boost.
